folder: Soundview Avenue & Watson Avenue, Bronx, NY
text:
Soundview Ave., north from Watson Ave. to Westchester Ave. (its terminus), showing the Soundview Ave. elevated station of the I.R.T. Pelham Bay Park subway line, on the latter thoroughfare.

P. L. Sperr.

July 30, 1928.

ASSUMING STREET TO BE NORTH AND SOUTH
